entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'the Chosen One'. He is trying to get a memory from Slughorn.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A Potions master who has a tear-filled eye and seems unable to look away. Harry is trying to get a memory from him.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to get a memory from Slughorn, who has the information that Dumbledore needs.
Dumbledore needs information, which Harry also needs. This is why Harry is trying to get a memory from Slughorn.
Harry has to kill Slughorn because he is the Chosen One.
